title: Bloomberg Markets: ABA's Nichols Discusses Choice Bill
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: ABA's Nichols Discusses Choice Bill
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Robert S Nichols President/CEO American Bankers Association Discussing what he likes about Financial Services Committee Chairman Jeb Hensarling’s Financial CHOICE bill, and that he does not favor a full scale pullback of Dodd-Frank.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
